messagebundle.msg:
Designing experiments and entering results
Selecting variables

  • Drag variables from “properties” to “vary” and “keep constant”.
    • If you vary a variable, choose one value for each trial.
    • For variables you keep constant you chooise a single value; all other trials will automatically be assigned that value.
  • Drag variables from “measures” to “measure”.

Adding and deleting experimental trials

  • Add a trial by pressing .
  • To delete a trial click the minus icon at the end of a row.

Assigning values to variables

  • Click to choose a value. In order to be able to assign values to variables you jave to have at least one trial.

Entering measures/results

  • Enter measures/results by pressing , type the value and press enter.

Adjusting or deleting trials
  Deleting or moving variables

  • You can delete a variable by dragging it it outside the table.
  • You can move a variable by dragging it from one box to another.

Deleting trials

  • Delete a trials by clicking the minus icon at the end of a row. Warning: You cannot retrieve deleted trials. Trials for which you entered a result are automatically saved in the history table .

Adjusting values

  • Adjust a value by pressing .

Delete all (except history table) .

  • By pressing   the entire experiment design is cleared.

View and sort conducted trials

  • All your conducted trials can be viewed by clicking .
  • Trials can be sorted per variable by pressing .
  • You can delete trials by pressing the minus icon. You cannot retrieve those deleted trials.

Saving space

  • You can save space by toggling .
The value is automatically computed when you have entered the values on the left.
Press to add an experimental trial to your design. Design at least three experimental trials.
If you have completed your design, you can select and conduct experiments in the lab. Otherwise, add experimental trials.
Select and drag ALL properties to "Vary" or to "Keep constant", and select and drag at least one variable you want to measure to "Measure".

You can enter your results per experimental trial. Once you finalized a trial by entering the result you obtained, it will automatically be saved in a table where you can view all your conducted experimental trials and sort them ascending or descending per variable.
Enter values for all properties in the experimental trials.
You have completed this set of experimental trials. You can add additional trials, analyse the results with , or create a new set of experiments with .
Not all experiments have been completed. Do you really want to clear this design and create a new one?
Value is part of a completed experiment
Drop properties you want to keep constant here
Drop properties you want to vary here
Click to specify the value of this variable
Delete the current design and start with a new one. You will still be able to view the experiments you already conducted in the history table
View the experimental trials you conducted
